landing_page_subtitle: The all-in-one Geometry Dash list and creator hub.
not_your_friend_error: You must be friends with {username} to view their profile.
own_profile_error: You cannot view your own profile here. Go to your Account page.
already_friends: You are already friends with this user.
no_pinned_record: This user has not pinned a record.
no_completion_log: This user has not added any records to their progression list.
video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
guidelines_intro: These guidelines establish the standards for submitting performance records and adding new challenges to the DashRank Benchmark List. The goal is to promote fairness, legitimacy, and consistency across all ranked entries.
guidelines_relationship_p1_1: DashRank is an independent project and is not affiliated with Pointercrate.
guidelines_relationship_p1_2: While our rules are comprehensive, the
guidelines_relationship_p1_4: serve as the foundational standard for all submissions. We enforce all Pointercrate rules regarding hacks, tools, and conduct. In addition, we have specific requirements listed below.
guidelines_relationship_p2: All levels from the official Pointercrate Demonlist are automatically included and ranked here. Our list then expands upon this with other community-vetted challenges, including platformer levels.
guidelines_submission_p1: To ensure all records are legitimate, all submissions must meet the following criteria:
guidelines_submission_li1: Video Proof: All records must be accompanied by uncut video proof. The video must include the in-game death effect and the endscreen (if applicable).
guidelines_submission_li2: Audio: The video must contain audio. Clicks are strongly encouraged but not mandatory. If no clicks are provided, in-game music and sound effects must be clearly audible.
guidelines_submission_li3: Raw Footage: For any record in the Top 150 (or equivalent), moderators may request raw footage (e.g., from OBS, ShadowPlay, or Medal). Failure to provide it may result in the record being rejected.
guidelines_submission_li4: No End-of-Level Celebrations: Do not exit the level or celebrate before the level is fully completed. Wait for the endscreen to appear.
guidelines_new_level_p1: For a new challenge to be considered for the Benchmark List, it must:
guidelines_new_level_li1: Be verified legitimately by a single player.
guidelines_new_level_li2: Receive significant positive reception and feedback from the community.
guidelines_new_level_li3: Be reviewed and rated by a committee of trusted list moderators.
guidelines_cheating_p1: The use of any tools or methods that alter the game's physics or provide an unfair advantage is strictly forbidden.
guidelines_cheating_li1: Prohibited Tools: This includes, but is not limited to, noclip, speedhacks, hitboxes, and macros.
guidelines_cheating_li2: Automation: Using any form of automated input is strictly forbidden and considered a serious offense.
guidelines_cheating_li3: Bug Abuse: Taking advantage of glitches or bugs to bypass sections of a challenge is not acceptable. You must complete the challenge as intended.
guidelines_integrity_p1: Maintaining the credibility of the DashRank list is a top priority. Any violation of the rules will be dealt with strictly.
guidelines_integrity_li1: What Counts as a Violation: This includes but isn’t limited to spliced videos, using automation tools, tampering with game mechanics, or submitting dishonest runs.
guidelines_integrity_li2: Penalties: If a user is caught submitting a fake or manipulated record, they will be permanently banned from submitting in the future. All of their previous records will be removed from the list.
guidelines_integrity_li3: Appeals: Banned users may file a single appeal. A supermajority vote from the DashRank Review Team is required to overturn a ban.
chat_create_desc: The group chat will be created once the first collaborator is accepted.
part_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this part?
no_parts_defined: No parts defined yet. Add one above.
chat_not_member: You must be a member of this layout's team to view the chat.

message_placeholder: e.g., 'I specialize in modern style!', 'What part can I take?'
layout_load_failed: Failed to load layout details. It may not exist.
report_success: Report submitted successfully. Our moderators will review it.
report_failed: Failed to submit report. You may have already reported this layout.
application_sent_success: Application sent! The layout creator will be notified.
application_sent_failed: Failed to send application. You may have already applied.
layout_submit_failed: Failed to submit layout. Please check your inputs.
description_placeholder: Describe your layout, what you're looking for, etc...
submit_new_layout_desc: Share your unfinished layout with the community to find decorators and get feedback. Please provide a video showcasing the gameplay.
no_layouts_found: No layouts found matching your criteria. Why not create one?
reports_load_error: Failed to load reports. You may not have administrator privileges.
dismiss_report_confirm: Are you sure you want to dismiss this report? This will mark it as resolved.
are_you_sure_remove_layout: Are you sure you want to permanently remove this layout? This will delete all its parts and collaboration requests.
are_you_sure_ban_creator: Are you sure you want to ban {username} from the Creator's Workshop?
search_too_short: Search query must be at least 3 characters.
friend_response_failed: Failed to respond to friend request.
no_pending_requests: You have no pending friend requests.
no_friends_yet: You haven't added any friends yet.
player_name_desc: This is the username that will be shown on the record.
level_name_desc: The exact name of the level you are submitting for.
public_video_desc: A link to the YouTube, Twitch, or Medal video. This will be publicly visible.
raw_footage_desc: A link to the unedited footage, uploaded to a service like Google Drive or Dropbox. This is required for all submissions.
notes_desc: Any additional comments for the list moderators.
submission_guidelines_ack: By submitting you acknowledge the submission guidelines.
submission_success: Record submitted successfully! A moderator will review it soon.
submission_failed: Failed to submit record. Please check your inputs.
username_update_success: Username updated successfully! You may need to log in again to see the change everywhere.
video_proof_desc: Video Proof (YouTube, Twitch, Google Drive, Medal)
thumbnail_desc: For non-YouTube videos, paste an image link (e.g., from Imgur).
no_embeddable_video: No embeddable video found for this level.
are_you_sure_remove_record: Are you sure you want to permanently remove this record?
level_not_found_on_list: Level with ID {levelId} not found on the {listType} list.
not_ranked_main_list: Not ranked on the main list.
info_about_desc: DashRank is the ultimate Geometry Dash demonlist — a community-driven hub that combines multiple demonlists into one powerful and easy-to-use platform. Instead of bouncing between different sites, DashRank brings everything together in one place with a clean interface and fast navigation.
info_future_1: Expanding all lists to include up to 150 levels.
info_future_2: Adding records to every level on every list.
info_future_3: Adding detailed statistics for every player.
info_history_desc: Please note: Automated position history tracking for all lists began on October 4, 2025. Changes made before this date are not reflected in a level's position history.
info_api_desc: The DashRank API is a free and open resource for the community. You can use the following endpoints to pull data directly from the database.
